info.description: Junction table for route-depot spatial associations

display_name.description: Auto-generated display name for UI (e.g., 'Speightstown Bus Terminal - 223m')

route_short_name.description: Cached route short name for UI display on Depot -> associated_routes

depot_name.description: Cached depot name for UI display and display_name composition

distance_from_route_m.description: Distance from depot to nearest route endpoint (start or end point, in meters)

is_start_terminus.description: True if depot is within walking distance of route start point

is_end_terminus.description: True if depot is within walking distance of route end point

precomputed_at.description: Timestamp when this association was last computed
